verbs.description: the miracle of the sun so that all [V: may] believe it was raining at the cova da iria on october 13 1917-raining so much in fact that the crowds gathered there their clothing drenched and dripping slipped in the puddles and along the trails of mud those who had umbrellas opened them against the downpour but they were still splashed and sodden all waited afonso lopes vieira almeida dr manuel formigão portugal researcher avelino de almeida dia lisbon cova da iria vatican gardens bar association edgar allan poe reporter catholic university of louvain catholic church fatima joaquim lourenço chairman new york times mary professor meessen dr manuel formigão university of coimbra saint john paul ii fr john de marchi pope benedict xv dr domingos pinto coelho ourém steuart campbell professor official dr almeida garrett santarém fatimah our lady of fatima alburitel st peter square russia journal of meteorology
